AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa: Defendant who pleaded guilty to charges of illegal re-entry after deportation, native and citizen of Mexico, made statements under oath during plea colloquy
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Court of Appeals for the F: Court that reviews appeals from the United States District Court for the Southern District of Texas, providing guidance on the interpretation of fast track programs
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Plea Agreement between Rogelio Valero-De: Agreement outlining terms of guilty plea, including waiver of right to collaterally attack conviction or sentence, signed by Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa. The agreement includes concessions made by the United States in exchange for the defendant's guilty plea.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rights waived by Rogelio Valero-De La Ro: Appellate rights waived by defendant in exchange for reduced sentence, with waiver considered knowing and voluntary, as found by the court
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Charges of illegal re-entry after deport: Criminal charges pending against the defendant, includes violation of supervised release by committing additional offenses, considered in sentencing
